Sheet Menu

Choose Sheet - Insert Rows - Rows Above.

Choose Sheet - Insert Rows - Rows Below.

Choose Sheet - Insert Columns - Columns Left.

Choose Sheet - Insert Columns - Columns Right.

Choose Sheet - Insert Page Break.

Choose Sheet - Insert Page Break - Row Break.

Choose Sheet - Insert Page Break - Column Break.

Choose Sheet - Delete Page Break.

Choose Sheet - Delete Page Break - Row Break.

Choose Sheet - Delete Page Break - Column Break.
